other_tests.findings: Bilateral sacral stress fractures, possible involvement of the left medial ilium
Large infiltrative mass of left hemipelvis destroying left ilium, SI joint and sacrum. Involvement of adjacent paraspinal, iliacus, and gluteus muscles.
Large soft tissue mass centered around the left sacroiliac joints invading the ileum, sacrum, and adjacent musculature. Enlarged left external iliac lymph node.
